name: shopnow-duplicate-management
description: Salesforce duplicate management system with React frontend

scripts.setup: cd app && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../sf && npm install
scripts.test: cd app && npm test && cd ../sf && npm test
scripts.clean: rm -rf app/node_modules server/node_modules sf/node_modules && rm -f app/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json sf/package-lock.json
scripts.deploy:salesforce: cd sf && sf project deploy start
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy:salesforce && npm run build
